page.title: 03THE SCHOOL TIME CAPSULE
page.content: The idea of putting in a time capsule in the new school came from Mrs.Wilson,secretaryof the parent association,after seeing a Blue Peter programme.The time capsule was planted in the atrium on Monday,21st.January,1985.The ceremony was broadcasted on B.B.C.Wales television on the same day. The aluminium box was completely sealed.Aplague was placed directly above the capsule.It contains such things as a child's uniform,a football programme,apantomime programme(Peter Pan at Theatre Clwyd,Mold-Christmas1985),marbles,a gas bill,some coins,perfume,a letterfrom the headmaster,a tape recording of the school choir,a television licence,a school pen,stories about school life,a newspaper etc.
